alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 9:40PM CDT until July 12 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Montgomery County in western Arkansas... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 940 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mimosa, or 11 miles west of Mount Ida, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Norman... Mimosa... Albert Pike Recreation Area... Little Missouri Falls Recreatio... Black Springs... Fancyhill... Hopper... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
